summary: Validate the R&D exchange infrastructure end-to-end and confirm readiness for continued operations.

directives.details: Confirm ownership of the exchange readiness check and log acknowledgement in the ledger.
Inspect orders, reports, acknowledgements, and ledger directories; ensure heartbeat and sync cadences are operational.
Execute the scheduled offline sync cycle and capture latency metrics for the exchange hub.
File a readiness report summarizing findings, metrics, and any remediation follow-ups.

attachments.description: Sync utility referenced in the directives
